snippet: Knicks General Manager Steve Mills has not spoken publicly since the season began, continuing the front office’s practice of not explaining to fans what it is doing.
abstract: New York Knicks general manager Steve Mills has not spoken publicly since the season began, continuing the front office’s practice of not explaining to fans what it is doing; silence is a notable departure from Mills' pledge of open communication in preseason discussions.
lead_paragraph: Knicks General Manager Steve Mills has not spoken publicly since the season began, continuing the front office’s practice of not explaining to fans what it is doing.

headline.main: Silence of Knicks’ Mills Veers From Early Plan
headline.print_headline: Silence of Knicks’ Mills Veers From Early Plan
